titleStmt.title: My bonny dear Shonny my crowny my honey ...

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first line of lyrics.
"A satire on the discomfitures of the Whigs, including the revocation of London's charter, 4 Oct. 1682 & the death of Shaftesbury, 21 Jan. 1683." -- NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
